A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Most definitely the worst star wars movie I have ever seen. It filled with countless plot holes\, pointless side story\, Terrible charcters/character development\, far too much political views and most importantly it disrespects the Source material and the fans. If you love Star Wars\, like I have all my life\, don't see this movie spare your self the heart ache and disappointment.
